replies.msg: 點解交流電輸電更符合實際用途
交流電可以簡單地升降壓
Change in current flow --> change in magenetic field in solenoid --> step up/down transformer --> V increase, current decrease -> by P = I^2 R --> energy loss in cables decrease
Change in current flow --> change in magenetic field in solenoid --> step up/down transformer --> V increase, current decrease -> by P = I^2 R --> energy loss in cables decrease

Change in current flow --> change in magenetic field in solenoid --> step up/down transformer --> V increase, current decrease -> by P = I^2 R --> energy loss in cables decrease

秒

同埋既然係比較

可以比較埋DC
DC -> inefficient for low voltage, high current circuit. -> 用DC既話個generator要好近先可行
同埋一切既電器火車摩打都要有唔volt既dc generator
所以ac較dc 實用
